00045 function numericOnly(inpEl, e)
00046 {
00047              var key;
00048              var keychar;
00049 
00050              if (window.event) {
00051                 key = window.event.keyCode;
00052              } else if (e) {
00053                 key = e.which;
00054              } else {
00055                 return true;
00056              }
00057              keychar = String.fromCharCode(key);
00058 
00059              if ((key==null) || (key==0) || (key==8) || (key==9) || (key==13) || (key==27)) {
00060                 return true;
00061              }
00062              if (("0123456789").indexOf(keychar) > -1) {
00063                 return true;
00064              }
00065              return false;
00066 }
